thread.title: Schoolboy Q’s Father-Daughter Look Shut Down the Red Carpet

title: Schoolboy Q’s Father-Daughter Look Shut Down the Red Carpet
text:
Yes! Photo: groovyq/Instagram The Grammys may already be off to a rip-roaring start, but let’s all take a moment to appreciate the coordinated father-daughter look that ScHoolboy Q pulled off with his young daughter, Joy.
UR MANS SCHOOLBOY Q 
CAME WITH HIS DAUGHTER
HAD HER IN A PINK GUCCI SUIT
AND HIS HOODIE 
BEST DRESSED CONTENDER #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/vW4otiDFLm 
— Bhance Da Trapper (@dances) February 13, 2017 Groovy Joy 
A photo posted by ScHoolboy Q (@groovyq) on Feb 12, 2017 at 2:36pm PST 
Extremely fresh.
